docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Nov. 11 -- Brazilian Foreign Minister Oswaldo Aranha arrived by plane from Rio de Janeiro late this afternoon on his way to Chile for an official visit.

docs.snippet: In the present critical test that Western Hemisphere solidarity is undergoing, Dr. Juan Carlos Blanco, Uruguay's first Ambassador to the United States since the elevation of that country legation in Washington to the rank of embassy, declared...
docs.lead_paragraph: In the present critical test that Western Hemisphere solidarity is undergoing, Dr. Juan Carlos Blanco, Uruguay's first Ambassador to the United States since the elevation of that country legation in Washington to the rank of embassy, declared yesterday that the Montevideo government adheres faithfully to the good-neighbor policy and its economic principles.
docs.abstract: Uruguayan-U S good relations stressed by Amb Blanco

docs.snippet: Although foreign traders have urged merging of the British blacklist and the United States proclaimed list, the same names appear in the supplementary listings of the governments in the case of only two Latin-American countries -- Panama and Paraguay...
docs.lead_paragraph: Although foreign traders have urged merging of the British blacklist and the United States proclaimed list, the same names appear in the supplementary listings of the governments in the case of only two Latin-American countries -- Panama and Paraguay -- it was revealed in an analysis issued by the Foreign Credit Interchange Bureau to its members yesterday.

docs.snippet: WORD came from Buenos Aires last week that Argentina, which has announced its intention of according postal honor to "the greatest and most outstanding figures of our national glories," will issue a 5-centavos stamp in commemoration of the centenary...
docs.lead_paragraph: WORD came from Buenos Aires last week that Argentina, which has announced its intention of according postal honor to "the greatest and most outstanding figures of our national glories," will issue a 5-centavos stamp in commemoration of the centenary of the birth of Jose Manuel Estrada, distinguished writer, orator, educator and diplomat.
docs.abstract: Argentina to issue birth anniv commemorative stamp

headline.main: Stamps of the Argentine To Show Jose Estrada, Leader in Schools

docs.snippet: To keep a continuity of their organization in spite of the interruption of activities abroad, the International Federation of University Women has called a meeting this week for delegates from associations in countries of the Western Hemisphere.
docs.lead_paragraph: To keep a continuity of their organization in spite of the interruption of activities abroad, the International Federation of University Women has called a meeting this week for delegates from associations in countries of the Western Hemisphere.

headline.main: University Women To Meet in Havana; Western Hemisphere Will Be Represented at the First Regional Gathering
